KEY_ITEM_W02_POWER_KEY_BLA_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W02_POWER_KEY_BLA_DESCRIPTION.text: An ebony staff with a carving of a black swan. It's enchanted with water magic.

KEY_ITEM_W02_POWER_KEY_BLA_02_DESCRIPTIO.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W02_POWER_KEY_BLA_02_DESCRIPTIO.text: A magical staff with an eerie aura.

KEY_ITEM_W02_POWER_KEY_RED_01_DESCRIPTIO.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W02_POWER_KEY_RED_01_DESCRIPTIO.text: A flaming scale of the Salamander. It greatly amplifies the red witches' magical power.

KEY_ITEM_W02_POWER_KEY_RED_02_DESCRIPTIO.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W02_POWER_KEY_RED_02_DESCRIPTIO.text: A detoxifying agent that works well against water-based poisons—the sorts that extinguish flames.

KEY_ITEM_W02_POWER_KEY_RED_03_DESCRIPTIO.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W02_POWER_KEY_RED_03_DESCRIPTIO.text: Two fireproof gloves, one from each sister. A different name is embroidered on each.

KEY_ITEM_W02_DISASTER_PIECE_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W02_DISASTER_PIECE_DESCRIPTION.text: A sinister fragment that brings evil to the witches' world.

KEY_ITEM_W03_POISON_BOTTLE_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W03_POISON_BOTTLE_DESCRIPTION.text: A bottle of poison obtained from a freed witch.

KEY_ITEM_W12_WOODPILE_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W12_WOODPILE_DESCRIPTION.text: Wood cut into small pieces and bundled.

KEY_ITEM_W12_MATCH_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W12_MATCH_DESCRIPTION.text: Strange matches that can thaw ice.

KEY_ITEM_W12_ARTEFACT_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W12_ARTEFACT_DESCRIPTION.text: A piece of an artifact that dates back to the Imperial era.

KEY_ITEM_W10_DISK_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W10_DISK_DESCRIPTION.text: A storage chip to help restore the relic database.

KEY_ITEM_W10_CODE_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W10_CODE_DESCRIPTION.text: A code used to open something...somewhere.

KEY_ITEM_W10_TRIANGLE_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W10_TRIANGLE_DESCRIPTION.text: A page torn from a book.

KEY_ITEM_W10_KATANA_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W10_KATANA_DESCRIPTION.text: This sword seems to have a story behind it.

KEY_ITEM_W10_JEWEL_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W10_JEWEL_DESCRIPTION.text: Might be a nice accessory, actually.

KEY_ITEM_W10_MAG_DATA_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W10_MAG_DATA_DESCRIPTION.text: A label applied to the case for a specimen known as the Beast King.

KEY_ITEM_W10_BOOK_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W10_BOOK_DESCRIPTION.text: You received this page as a little souvenir.

KEY_ITEM_W10_TAILE_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W10_TAILE_DESCRIPTION.text: You received this in place of a reward.

KEY_ITEM_W10_KEY_RY_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W10_KEY_RY_DESCRIPTION.text: The key to the lift that allows connection between the Red and Yellow Divisions on the lower levels.

KEY_ITEM_W10_KEY_RB_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W10_KEY_RB_DESCRIPTION.text: The key to the lift that allows connection between the Green and Red Divisions on the lower levels.

KEY_ITEM_W10_KEY_BY_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W10_KEY_BY_DESCRIPTION.text: The key to the lift that allows connection between the Yellow and Green Divisions on the lower levels.

KEY_ITEM_W10_SEED_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W10_SEED_DESCRIPTION.text: The seed of a selectively bred monophid, one harmless to humans and animals. Where could you even grow this?

KEY_ITEM_W10_EGG_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W10_EGG_DESCRIPTION.text: The egg of the tsuchinoko. Will it hatch?

KEY_ITEM_W10_CLYSTAL_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W10_CLYSTAL_DESCRIPTION.text: It looks like this can be processed further.

KEY_ITEM_W10_KEY_6_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W10_KEY_6_DESCRIPTION.text: A key that lets you access the abandoned zone.

KEY_ITEM_W04_JADE_JAR_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W04_JADE_JAR_DESCRIPTION.text: A precious decoration stolen by pirates.

KEY_ITEM_W04_CONTRACT_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W04_CONTRACT_DESCRIPTION.text: The lease for the lighthouse. The scientist has signed it.

KEY_ITEM_W04_SUGAR_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W04_SUGAR_DESCRIPTION.text: Sugar is a specialty of the south. You should take it to the Northern Trade Port.

KEY_ITEM_W04_GHOST_AXE_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W04_GHOST_AXE_DESCRIPTION.text: A precious axe given to you by a wandering ghost. You should return it to its rightful owner.

KEY_ITEM_W04_MONSTER_SURVEY_01_DESCRIPTI.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W04_MONSTER_SURVEY_01_DESCRIPTI.text: A memory board with detailed data on the smaller fiends of the sea.

KEY_ITEM_W04_MONSTER_SURVEY_02_DESCRIPTI.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W04_MONSTER_SURVEY_02_DESCRIPTI.text: A memory board with a survey on the biggest fiends of the sea.

KEY_ITEM_W04_TIME_CONTROLLER_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W04_TIME_CONTROLLER_DESCRIPTION.text: A mysterious device covered in barnacles after years of sitting at the bottom of the sea.

KEY_ITEM_W04_RUBY_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W04_RUBY_DESCRIPTION.text: A treasure of the Mare Nostrum. This mysterious red jewel boasts revitalizing properties.

KEY_ITEM_W04_SAPPHIRE_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W04_SAPPHIRE_DESCRIPTION.text: A treasure of the Mare Nostrum. This mysterious blue jewel boasts revitalizing properties.

KEY_ITEM_W04_BALTASAR_HEART_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W04_BALTASAR_HEART_DESCRIPTION.text: The heart of Baltasar the pirate—and the key to his immortality.

KEY_ITEM_W04_BLUE_DRAGONS_EGG_DESCRIPTIO.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W04_BLUE_DRAGONS_EGG_DESCRIPTIO.text: The egg that will one day hatch into the god of the Mare Nostrum.

KEY_ITEM_W04_PIRATES_FLAG_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W04_PIRATES_FLAG_DESCRIPTION.text: A flag that serves as proof of a pirate's defeat. Take it to the Southern Trade Port for a reward.

KEY_ITEM_W09_HORSE_TICKET_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W09_HORSE_TICKET_DESCRIPTION.text: A ticket for the coach. It lets you move two blocks.

KEY_ITEM_W09_VEHICLE_TICKET_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W09_VEHICLE_TICKET_DESCRIPTION.text: A ticket for the motorcar. It lets you move three blocks.

KEY_ITEM_W09_TRAM_TICKET_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W09_TRAM_TICKET_DESCRIPTION.text: A ticket for the tram. It lets you move one block.

KEY_ITEM_W09_IDOL_SIGNATURE_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W09_IDOL_SIGNATURE_DESCRIPTION.text: A signed photo of an up-and-coming singer in Avalon. This is a cheap item.

KEY_ITEM_W09_IDOL_SIGNATURE_02_DESCRIPTI.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W09_IDOL_SIGNATURE_02_DESCRIPTI.text: A photo signed with love by a hugely popular singer. This is a valuable item.

KEY_ITEM_W09_GOLD_MEDAL_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W09_GOLD_MEDAL_DESCRIPTION.text: A beautiful medal made in Avalon and earned as a reward. This is a valuable item.

KEY_ITEM_W09_ANNIVERSARY_GIFT_DESCRIPTIO.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W09_ANNIVERSARY_GIFT_DESCRIPTIO.text: A special trinket celebrating the museum's bicentennial anniversary. This is a cheap item.

KEY_ITEM_W09_MEMORIAL_PLATE_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W09_MEMORIAL_PLATE_DESCRIPTION.text: A golden shield to commemorate your being the billionth visitor to the museum. This is a valuable item.

KEY_ITEM_W09_CERTIFICATE_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W09_CERTIFICATE_DESCRIPTION.text: A certificate of praise for those who have cooperated with and contributed to a police investigation. This is a valuable item.

KEY_ITEM_W09_OLD_CROWN_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W09_OLD_CROWN_DESCRIPTION.text: A mysterious accessory rich in history. This is a valuable item.

KEY_ITEM_W09_MEDAL_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W09_MEDAL_DESCRIPTION.text: A medal made in Avalon that is often earned as a reward. This is a cheap item.

KEY_ITEM_W09_VINTAGE_WINE_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W09_VINTAGE_WINE_DESCRIPTION.text: A fine wine obtained from a pub in Avalon. This is a valuable item.

KEY_ITEM_W09_BISCUIT_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W09_BISCUIT_DESCRIPTION.text: Despite their price, these nicely browned biscuits are a tasty treat. This is a cheap item.

KEY_ITEM_W09_OLD_TIARA_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W09_OLD_TIARA_DESCRIPTION.text: An eerie, but luxurious tiara. This is a valuable item.

KEY_ITEM_W09_RUSTY_SWORD_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W09_RUSTY_SWORD_DESCRIPTION.text: This storied curio once belonged to a knight of yore, but has since rusted. This is a valuable item.

KEY_ITEM_W09_LEATHER_HANDBAG_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W09_LEATHER_HANDBAG_DESCRIPTION.text: A leather bag common to Avalon. This is a cheap item.

KEY_ITEM_W09_ANIMAL_PERFUME_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W09_ANIMAL_PERFUME_DESCRIPTION.text: A rare cologne whose sweet scent envelops the body. This is a valuable item.

KEY_ITEM_W09_CAVIAR_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W09_CAVIAR_DESCRIPTION.text: Rare sturgeon eggs that make for high-quality caviar. This is a valuable item.

KEY_ITEM_W09_TRUFFLE_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W09_TRUFFLE_DESCRIPTION.text: Rare truffles that smell delectable. This is a valuable item.

KEY_ITEM_W09_BAKED_BREAD_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W09_BAKED_BREAD_DESCRIPTION.text: Bread from the finest bakery in all of Avalon. This is a cheap item.

KEY_ITEM_W09_STUFFED_BIRD_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W09_STUFFED_BIRD_DESCRIPTION.text: A taxidermied peacock that some fancy noble might like. This is a valuable item.

KEY_ITEM_W09_UNAGIPIE_PASTRY_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W09_UNAGIPIE_PASTRY_DESCRIPTION.text: It's delicious and tastes like happiness, but the ingredients are questionable. This is a cheap item.

KEY_ITEM_W09_SURPRISED_JUICE_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W09_SURPRISED_JUICE_DESCRIPTION.text: A strange libation of unknown origins. Drink it for a little surprise! This is a cheap item.

KEY_ITEM_W09_DIAMOND_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W09_DIAMOND_DESCRIPTION.text: Gems produced by lostlings. The more offered to the Crown, the better your reward.

KEY_ITEM_W09_GOLD_WAND_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W09_GOLD_WAND_DESCRIPTION.text: It's impossible to determine the worth of this wand. Some sort of power emanates from it.

KEY_ITEM_W09_GOLD_RING_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W09_GOLD_RING_DESCRIPTION.text: It's impossible to determine the worth of this ring. Some sort of power emanates from it.

KEY_ITEM_W09_GOLD_NECKLACE_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W09_GOLD_NECKLACE_DESCRIPTION.text: It's impossible to determine the worth of this necklace. Some sort of power emanates from it.

KEY_ITEM_W06_ANTIBODY_STOMACH_DESCRIPTIO.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W06_ANTIBODY_STOMACH_DESCRIPTIO.text: An ultimate power sealed within the Digestica.

KEY_ITEM_W06_ANTIBODY_LUNGS_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W06_ANTIBODY_LUNGS_DESCRIPTION.text: An ultimate power sealed within the Respiquary.

KEY_ITEM_W06_ANTIBODY_BRAIN_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W06_ANTIBODY_BRAIN_DESCRIPTION.text: An ultimate power sealed within the Cognitheon.

KEY_ITEM_W06_ANTIBODY_HEART_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W06_ANTIBODY_HEART_DESCRIPTION.text: An ultimate power sealed within the Circuleum.

KEY_ITEM_W06_MUCUS_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W06_MUCUS_DESCRIPTION.text: A sticky liquid harvested from mucolisks.

KEY_ITEM_W06_MITOCHONDRIA_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W06_MITOCHONDRIA_DESCRIPTION.text: A squishy object received from High Priest Valkoinen.

KEY_ITEM_W19_SEEDS_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W19_SEEDS_DESCRIPTION.text: A strange seed that will sprout into vines when planted in a waterfall basin. Climb the vine to move to a higher area.

KEY_ITEM_W19_INSECTS_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W19_INSECTS_DESCRIPTION.text: When released, this bug will eat vines, causing a waterfall to appear in their place. Use the waterfall to move to a lower area.

KEY_ITEM_W19_WHISTLE_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W19_WHISTLE_DESCRIPTION.text: Play the flute to have the eagle help you.

KEY_ITEM_W19_SCALE_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W19_SCALE_DESCRIPTION.text: A shell piece that seems to fit on the petrified turtle.

KEY_ITEM_W19_TOOTH_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W19_TOOTH_DESCRIPTION.text: A sharp tooth that seems to fit in the mouth of the petrified bear.

KEY_ITEM_W19_NUT_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W19_NUT_DESCRIPTION.text: A large walnut that will make the petrified squirrel's day.

KEY_ITEM_W19_WINGS_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W19_WINGS_DESCRIPTION.text: A large wing that seems to match the petrified bat.

KEY_ITEM_W19_EGGS_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W19_EGGS_DESCRIPTION.text: A snake stole this egg and was looking to eat it. It clearly belongs elsewhere.

KEY_ITEM_W19_BRANCH_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W19_BRANCH_DESCRIPTION.text: A stick from the beaver's dam.

KEY_ITEM_W14_ANTIDOTE_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W14_ANTIDOTE_DESCRIPTION.text: A witchy potion that can neutralize all manner of poisons.

KEY_ITEM_W19_ANT_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W19_ANT_DESCRIPTION.text: This ant is lost. Take it back to its colony.

KEY_ITEM_W19_CUCKOO_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W19_CUCKOO_DESCRIPTION.text: A cuckoo that wants to go back to its nest.

KEY_ITEM_W19_OWL_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W19_OWL_DESCRIPTION.text: An owl that wants to go back to its nest.

KEY_ITEM_W19_DRAGONFLY_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W19_DRAGONFLY_DESCRIPTION.text: This dragonfly is lost. Take it back to its friend.

KEY_ITEM_W08_EARTHWORM_NORMAL_DESCRIPTIO.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W08_EARTHWORM_NORMAL_DESCRIPTIO.text: Food for the residents of Cordycep. Acceptably nutritious at the end of the day.

KEY_ITEM_W08_EARTHWORM_RARE_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W08_EARTHWORM_RARE_DESCRIPTION.text: Food for the residents of Cordycep. A lively specimen chock-full of nutrients.

KEY_ITEM_W08_STONE_NORMAL_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W08_STONE_NORMAL_DESCRIPTION.text: A stone that looks and feels normal. Someone is collecting such things.

KEY_ITEM_W08_STONE_RARE_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W08_STONE_RARE_DESCRIPTION.text: A beautiful stone with a smooth texture. Someone is collecting such things.

KEY_ITEM_W13_ENERGY_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W13_ENERGY_DESCRIPTION.text: A device that controls the sand's energy functions, making it difficult for it to undergo complicated movements.

KEY_ITEM_W13_BREAK_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W13_BREAK_DESCRIPTION.text: A device that prevents the sand from falling apart, making it difficult for it to take defensive actions.

KEY_ITEM_W13_FOCUS_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W13_FOCUS_DESCRIPTION.text: A device that prevents the sand from clumping, making it difficult for it to take offensive actions.

KEY_ITEM_W13_MOVE_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_W13_MOVE_DESCRIPTION.text: A device that prevents the sand from shifting, making it difficult for it to take quick movements.

KEY_ITEM_C01_LAST_TICKET_DESCRIPTION.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_C01_LAST_TICKET_DESCRIPTION.text: What horrifically challenging visions await you in the Beyond?

KEY_ITEM_C01_YARIKOMI_TICKET_1_DESCRIPTI.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_C01_YARIKOMI_TICKET_1_DESCRIPTI.text: Mr. S is taking no prisoners. Prepare for a trial like one you've never faced before.

KEY_ITEM_C01_YARIKOMI_TICKET_2_DESCRIPTI.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_C01_YARIKOMI_TICKET_2_DESCRIPTI.text: Mr. S is taking no prisoners. Prepare for a trial like one you've never faced before.

KEY_ITEM_C01_YARIKOMI_TICKET_3_DESCRIPTI.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_C01_YARIKOMI_TICKET_3_DESCRIPTI.text: Mr. S is taking no prisoners. Prepare for a trial like one you've never faced before.

KEY_ITEM_C01_YARIKOMI_TICKET_4_DESCRIPTI.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_C01_YARIKOMI_TICKET_4_DESCRIPTI.text: Mr. S is taking no prisoners. Prepare for a trial like one you've never faced before.

KEY_ITEM_C01_YARIKOMI_TICKET_5_DESCRIPTI.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_C01_YARIKOMI_TICKET_5_DESCRIPTI.text: Mr. S is taking no prisoners. Prepare for a trial like one you've never faced before.

KEY_ITEM_C01_YARIKOMI_TICKET_6_DESCRIPTI.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_C01_YARIKOMI_TICKET_6_DESCRIPTI.text: Mr. S is taking no prisoners. Prepare for a trial like one you've never faced before.

KEY_ITEM_C01_YARIKOMI_TICKET_7_DESCRIPTI.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_C01_YARIKOMI_TICKET_7_DESCRIPTI.text: Mr. S is taking no prisoners. Prepare for a trial like one you've never faced before.

KEY_ITEM_C01_YARIKOMI_TICKET_8_DESCRIPTI.speaker: UI
KEY_ITEM_C01_YARIKOMI_TICKET_8_DESCRIPTI.text: Mr. S is taking no prisoners. Prepare for a trial like one you've never faced before.
